name: Puzzle Crusher
description:
Story: A boy finds himself tapped in a room that keeps changing on him, monsters and mazes he must go through in order to get out... I he can.

If I manage to figure out a way to make music that will be added to the game as soon as possible.

Controls:
Mouse is for aiming and the mouse buttons are used for triggers.
WASD and arrow keys are used for the movement.

Find your way out of the room changing game called Puzzle Crushers
